import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react' import { Container, AppBar, Typography, Grow, Grid } from "@material-ui/core" import { useDispatch } from 'react-redux' import { getPosts } from './actions/posts' import Posts from './components/Posts/Posts' import Form from './components/Form/Form' import useStyles from './styles' import instaverse from './images/Instaverse.png' const App = () => { const [currentId, setCurrentId] = useState(null) const classes = useStyles() const dispatch = useDispatch() useEffect(() => { dispatch(getPosts()) }, [currentId, dispatch]) return ( Create {/* */}
) } export default App
